title: Ransomware Attack Detected
summary: 50,000 files have been encrypted within a short timeframe, shadow copies have been deleted, and a ransom note has been dropped. The high CPU usage indicates an encryption process, indicating a probable Ransomware attack.
investigation_steps: Inspect encrypted files for unique signatures
Analyze network traffic for C&C communication
Check system logs for account and privilege escalation activity
verdict: Ransomware attack confirmed. Immediate incident response is required.
